website_summaries.verdict: This best-selling model prints a whopping 435 characters per second, yet has a lighter, more efficient motor for long-lasting functionality.
pros: Prints on continuous feed paper, single sheets, and various labels
also prints multiple-page invoices without incident
Comes with USB and power cords
Incredibly durable, even withstanding environments prone to dust and dirt – and lasts for many years
cons: Set up is not intuitive and can be a bit involved
Much noisier than more expensive dot matrix printers

customer_reviews.title: Fast, prints clear, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Next I'm going to insall an 8 track in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Grinzy

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this printer for use in our current campaign of shipping out @1200 packages for military deployed at Christmas. The Oki Microline 320 worked perfectly, although I did have some unexpected issues with my win 7 computer halfway through and ended up finishing on a win10. Does everything work perfectly on a Win10? No, but I didn't expect it to. Did it work well enough? Absolutely. Campaign is over and shipped, and my arthritis is not the first thing on my mind. Sounds like a win to me!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: An oldie but a goodie. If you need a ...
customer_reviews.text: An oldie but a goodie. If you need a dot matrix, this is the go-to printer for you. I've used these for years for printing pick tickets and invoices in a warehouse environment. This replaced the same model that was about 10 years old.
customer_reviews.author: bezanator

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two at the other shopping mall before buying this product, but the product did not work and I returned it all. So I hesitated to buy this product. However, this product worked really well and is now very satisfied. Also, I was able to ship the product soon. The seller of this product is reliable and honest.
customer_reviews.author: Eunjae

customer_reviews.title: It does exactly what a dot-matrix should do.
customer_reviews.text: We use this in a small office because we print 3-page carbon invoices. This is a no-frills model that includes both usb and lpt printer inputs. Works well with Windows 7, 8 and 8.1. You can purchase cheap non-oem ribbons fairly cheap. Installation is simple, if your computer does not auto-detect, you can use the included install disk. It comes only with a power cord, no cables to connect. This is the 2nd Oki ML320 we've purchased in 2 years. Periodic maintenance (compressed air to blow out paper) is about the only thing you need to do. I love this model but pray for the day we no longer need a dot-matrix.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin F Chen

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time at work.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes you have to blow out with compressed air the small pieces of paper when used for extended periods.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: It is great!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a work horse of printers !!! It is great !!! when I need another one I will be contacting you all again !!!
customer_reviews.author: woody killough

customer_reviews.title: This machine is a workhorse. We have had at ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a workhorse. We have had at least 7 of them over the years, and they last forever. We had to replace this one, because it was under water in our flood in Baton Rouge last August. The one it replaces was 17 years old and going strong.
customer_reviews.author: patsyf1

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy printer
customer_reviews.text: Great printer and is a true workhorse. Very easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Del Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Recently replaced my Oki 320 with the one I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently replaced my Oki 320 with the one I had for 5 to 6 years. It gave me many years of maintenance free service. Totally Satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been using these printers over ten years,Five stars
customer_reviews.author: Kamil N.

customer_reviews.title: Great 9 pin printer.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we’ve had over the years. Extremely durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mrmike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice price. Works great. A dot matrix printer is 100% necessary for our company invoices for carbon purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Bandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Unit - Time Proven!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit in 2007, and it has been punished in my shop. It still works as good as the day I purchased it. I have worked with these units while working at the USPS, where I used to watch these printers spit out hundreds of pages of reports, thousands of pages a month!!!! It is not easy to kill one of these printers!
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Printer works great but one thing to check
customer_reviews.text: We replaced an aging printer of the same model that has been under hard use for many years. We use the printer through the serial card connection. We could not get it to connect until we saw that a newer serial card is needed for the newest printers of this model although there is no model change apparently changes were made in the serial interface. This raised the cost of the replacement of course. Google to find the serial numbers and required newer card if you use the serial interface. Otherwise the printer is a workhorse and performs as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Gatorred

customer_reviews.title: Exact replacement for existing line printer
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly, worked right out of the box. Replaced same model but very old printer. Exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT K.

customer_reviews.title: Our new " OKIDATA PRINTER " is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Our new " OKIDATA PRINTER " is awesome !!!!! When you work in a Dirt & Sand Mine, you need good & tough electronic's & machines. One day your humid or the next day you have alot of dust. But I've worked with a "Okidata " for the past 10 yrs. And they are tough machines. Thank you Washington Loop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't print properly
customer_reviews.text: For whatever reason our IT people could not make this print anything by garbage. Says he runs into this problem with this same printer a couple of times a year. I was forced to send it back for credit while I still could.
customer_reviews.author: W. Ainslie

customer_reviews.title: Old printer type
customer_reviews.text: Old type still required for some forms, it was a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Just Monitoring

customer_reviews.title: Saved my day!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! My printer stopped working while I was doing a month end. Ugh! I ordered this that night and had it within three days. I was very happy with the service and the printer is just what I was looking for. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: noels

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: It's like an old Cummins engine, it's loud, maybe a little behind times, but it'll go forever! Simply a solid product!
customer_reviews.author: JoeyR

customer_reviews.title: Good Okidata !!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my father company, It's a strong printer and durable. It maybe oldskool but comes with USB port, still doing his great job, never ran in a problem with it, I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: It is a printer - what else would you expect?
customer_reviews.text: It is a printer - what else would you expect? Working without any incidents or breaks. Use too much cartridges and difficult to setup for desired fonts. Sometimes ignoring what programs say it to do. Otherwise good matrix printer.
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr Nemets

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Printer was described spot on! Printer was brand new. It was the cheapest I found when comparing. Will definitely purchase again from this seller. Thank you for offering this item at a wonderful price !
customer_reviews.author: robin graham

customer_reviews.title: Old school
customer_reviews.text: Our sheetmetal shop still uses a program that prints labels on a 9 pin. I was actually surprised that I could find a replacement. Our old one was over 10 years old and it was purchased used then.
customer_reviews.author: bryan bowman

customer_reviews.title: Reliable multi-part printer
customer_reviews.text: A very reliable workhorse printer for applications requiring multi-part continuous form printing. Strongly recommend this printer for reliable and inexpensive print option.
customer_reviews.author: jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Old School Work Hourse
customer_reviews.text: Our 320 died after at least 10 years of daily use and I was so happy to find another on Amazon.com. Didnt need to fiddle with any settings or print drivers. Just plugged it in and back to business. OOh yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: As expected for refurbished
customer_reviews.text: Almost like new - small software glitch requires me to constantly press the select button to start printing. Plus paper roller bar does not feed 100% of the time. But this is easy to live with since the price was 1/2 of a new printer
customer_reviews.author: A W Johnson

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Great equipment and tech support. I have used OKIDATA printers since about 1982 and have found them very reliable and will continue to use them,
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Printer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent printer. Needed a new printer to replace my old Panasonic dot matrix for home office billing. This one works great. Seller was great to. Was suppose to get it in two business days but received it one. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Veloza

customer_reviews.title: I purchased for my mother's practice b/c she's used to ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my mother's practice b/c she's used to this brand & product. Only lasted 2 months before I had to replace it
customer_reviews.author: MoeMoe

customer_reviews.title: Great printer
customer_reviews.text: We have been using these for years and their built like tanks, if you're needing a tracto feed, multi-part printer this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: G. Yarbrough

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Pain setting up, but works great once you figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Surlat

customer_reviews.title: Okidata works great
customer_reviews.text: We use these printers in our auto sales business. 4 part contracts are a necessity and Okidata does the best job. Cheaper to by a new one than repair minor problems. Shipped fast too.
customer_reviews.author: canuckalakai

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived in great condition and was easy to setup as a replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived in great condition and was easy to setup as a replacement for an older device in our offices. Working great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jerod Blackman

customer_reviews.title: Don't be afraid.
customer_reviews.text: Totally! This was just like a brand New one. Works like a champ! Thank You Very Much!
customer_reviews.author: You Maka Me HOT Coffee Roasting Company

customer_reviews.title: Great new printer
customer_reviews.text: This printer replace an older same model That was about 16 years old. Talk about a work horse. This works perfectly for what my company needs
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer.
customer_reviews.text: I actually have two of these. One in my pawn shop, and one at my car dealership. They really seem to hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product! serves our office well
customer_reviews.text: Great product! serves our office well. Received exactly what we ordered in a timely matter. Would order from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF H.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my office and it works well. I have used it for several months now and I am completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Ruso Minnifield

customer_reviews.title: Love this printer - This is my third Oki in ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this printer - This is my third Oki in 40 years, and I use it everyday and it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret H.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great! I have been using Microline Turbo printers for ...
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! I have been using Microline Turbo printers for 30 years. The one that I had been using for the last 15+ years on a daily basis for work finally gave out. These printers cost quite a bit of money and I couldn't afford to by a new one so I was excited to find this reconditioned one at about half the price of a new one. I purchased this one about 3 months ago and haven't had any issues with it, it runs great. Here's hoping that it will last 15 years.
customer_reviews.author: MEP

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase. These are hard to find and was pleased to get one here.
customer_reviews.author: caa40y

customer_reviews.title: paper get stack
customer_reviews.text: paper stack twice a day that y I bought new machine not surprise technology from the #80th need to upgrade to different system
customer_reviews.author: Maketen

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The Okidata printer is good. Although the price is not cheap, the quality is good. I like it. Will order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Little Apple

customer_reviews.title: WE LOVE OUR OKIDATA PRINTER
customer_reviews.text: WE WERE GOING TO BUY A NEW ONE AND A FRIEND OF OURS MENTIONED HE BOUGHT HIS ON AMAZON REMANUFACTORED WE WERE UNSURE AT FIRST, BUT WE ARE GLAD WE DID ALL IS WORKING PERFECT HAVE NOT HAD ANY PROPLEMS AND IT IS WORKING LIKE IT WAS NEW...
customer_reviews.author: elsa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This printer replaced an older model and because of the USB plug makes even easier to use with any computer and any version of windows.
customer_reviews.author: Noel

customer_reviews.title: A proven workhorse
customer_reviews.text: Been buying these for years for our customers. A proven workhorse for those needing an impact printer. Customer support, although rarely needed, is excellent. It's really an industry standard.
customer_reviews.author: JRB

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRINTER FOR HIGH VOLUME!
customer_reviews.text: We love this printer in our business. We use it to print invoices for a busy distribution company & they last about 4 years before they need to be replaced. We always go back to the same printer when it's time for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Both products were exactly what we needed and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: OKI 321 printer, not a OKI 320 as order, and it doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.author: Lyman Hogue

customer_reviews.title: Caution firm wear problem
customer_reviews.text: There is a firm wear problem with this machine. Had to get it reprogramed. Vendor would not exchange. Works now!
customer_reviews.author: Henri Goldfarb

customer_reviews.title: NOT a network printer as it says
customer_reviews.text: This printer says in the description that it is network capable. It is not. Although the company was willing to allow a return at their expense, I had already gotten rid of the packaging so they refused. I can understand that. I cannot understand them saying it is network capable. For those of you looking, It's the model number with an "N" after it if you want more than one person to print. The printer itself, for what it is, is a tank. It will work itself to death.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: No at all happy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 printers only one came with a paper tray and feeder continually jams not at all happy.dont recommend refurbished .
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy to deal with. Item is exactly as described! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Grastataro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Recieved items in a timely manner. Product seem to be operating well.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES COOK

customer_reviews.title: Okidata Microline 320 Turbo 9 Pin Impact Printer
customer_reviews.text: Easy ordering process and I received the printer sooner than expected. Setup of the printer was fairly easy and the machine itself is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Okidati 320 Turbo
customer_reviews.text: Received printer had visible damage to box,printer didn,t show damage, hooked it up and it would not pair up with our program to print contracts
customer_reviews.author: L. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Solid workhorse
customer_reviews.text: Over the past 25 years I have purchased at least 25 of these for my business. They work hard every day and last for several years. I currently have 6 of these, and two of them are over 7 years old.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer!
customer_reviews.text: Got this one to replace the older 25-pin version connection. Had to redo the computer and couldn't get it to work again with the old parallel port PCI card so we got this instead.
customer_reviews.author: mlb6d9

customer_reviews.title: It does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: This printer was purchased to replace the same unit (brand and model). We like the old one so much that we decided to get the same one. Delivery was prompt and on time. Very satisfied with the whole experience.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A. Cejas

customer_reviews.title: satisfied okidata user
customer_reviews.text: WE RUN A LOCAL USED CAR LOT AND HAVE TO HAVE A PRINTER THAT WILL PRINT COPIES LIKE THE OKIDATA 320 TURBO. WE HAVE USE THIS PRINTERS FOR OVER 10 YEARS AND HAVE HAD NO PROBLEMS.
customer_reviews.author: gooch

customer_reviews.title: OKI320Turbo
customer_reviews.text: Printer is OK, It is noisy, print quality is not great,mostly outdated compared to most deskjet and laser printers.Would not have purchased except this was the only printer that worked with my software and 3 part forms.
customer_reviews.author: DaHO

customer_reviews.title: This had a bad control board after 15 days
customer_reviews.text: This had a bad control board after 15 days. I called to return it and they said it was not returnable but if you want to warranty the part you can take it to a repair center.
customer_reviews.author: KIM W

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to set-up. Calling for assistance is useless. They don't answer or return calls.
customer_reviews.author: jeff becker

customer_reviews.title: It sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The ribbon cartridge failed quickly and had to spend money getting a new one. It sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Teeluckdharry Maharaj

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I knew it was an used printer, it worked for 3 weeks and then broke permanently.
customer_reviews.author: Jose S.

customer_reviews.title: Good printer.
customer_reviews.text: Had one that got damaged by burglar vandal, when I was at court. That cause inconvenience in printing court papers. Later caught vandal, tied him to opposing lawyer, and opposing lawyer lost his license ... behave yourself or you will catch yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce M. Lockert

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Bought in August, already have to get a new one. Does not want to print, when it does it takes way too long. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Oki MICROLINE 320 Turbo Mono Dot Matrix Printer (62411601)
product_meta.description:
OKI MICROLINE 320 Turbo Mono Dot Matrix Printer (9 Pin) (435 cpm) (64 KB) (240 x 216 dpi) (120V) (Max Duty Cycle 20 000 Pages) (USB) (Parallel).

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Microline 320/321 Turbo builds on the OKI Tank-Tough heritage. This 9-pin printer is now engineered even tougher for dedicated printing in the most demanding point-of-sale, automation and utility applications. It can easily run twice as long as most printers in its class! And it's economical enough to put wherever you need data on the spot.

 The ML320/321 Turbo puts the "work" in workstations for financial departments, wholesale or retail sales counters, even for harsh or warehouse or manufacturing environments. Its relentless performance comes from the rugged printhead design—the lighter, stronger, more efficient motor; the long-lasting rack-and-pinion drive system; a protective, impact-resistant chassis; and a high performance that goes the distance.

 The printer can accommodate multi-part forms and stock that are up to twice as thick as those that fit our nearest competitor. The printhead delivers a stronger punch—right to the last page of a six-part form! A patented optical sensor accurately positions the printhead for the precise output, and the auto-tear feature accurately positions your continuous forms for a clean tear right at the perforation—eliminating wasted forms.

 The ML320/321 Turbo can meet your needs today and in the future. It's exactly the same size as the legendary ML320/321 and it's compatible with virtually all custom and off-the-shelf software, making it the perfect replacement. This machine has all the Tank-Tough reliability and high performance you need.

 What's in the Box
ML 320 Turbo Printer, power cable, CD-ROM, user guide, warranty information; printer cable not included
